title: Bug 2940: Export Zip: Updating of checkboxes should use busy cursor (1GKWVMA)
description: Bug 2940: Export Zip: Updating of checkboxes should use busy cursor (1GKWVMA) MA (01.10.2001 11:38:21)1.
OB: The system takes a long time (approximately 30 seconds in my case) to update the checked state of the table.
EB: I expect the system to show a busy cursor while updating the checked state of the table.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Open the application. 2. Navigate to the Export Zip feature. 3. Check a few checkboxes. 4. Observe the time it takes for the checked state to update.
